$values.Description: Originally only available to select Kingsisle Staff & Fansite partners in the North American Server during the early times of the game, it was rewarded to select Content Creators and Wiki Staff of the European Server in early 2024. However, it is very unlikely to make a return to the North American Server as newer Devs haven't been rewarded this Pet in the last few years. This Pet was unintentionally available for a few days in November 2024 after a player illegally obtained it in the game.
